title: The in-game model for Victorious Graves is utterly disapointing
body:
Alright so the teaser image Graves has:

http://media.comicbook.com/2017/10/league-of-legends-victorious-graves-1033072-1280x0.jpg

* Slick hair with some classy curls at the end
* Greasy mustache, fit for a thick cigar
* Badass wolf elements on his metalwork, you need strong muscles to carry that much metal
* Lee van Cleef nose, sharp as a spearhead

However, the in-game model Graves has

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DM7dXH-WkAE5Iks.jpg:large

* Actual Justin Bieber haircut, he looks like he does FIFA pack openings on Youtube
* Super metro beard, this guy only vapes
* A leg brace, he probably broke his leg when he fell out of meta
* Dull, plastic looking wolf elements on his gun and shoulder (Yeah he was nerfed, but that doesn't mean he has to use an actual Nerf gun)

_What happened?_
